blocks.title: Usage Conditions
items: Wi-Fi PLUS is an add-on to the existing fixed Internet service, allowing for Wi-Fi coverage extension.
The Wi-Fi PLUS service fee is added to the monthly subscription starting from the service activation date, confirmed via OTP code.
The monthly fee applies per each device granted for Wi-Fi coverage expansion. Max 3 devices per fixed Internet connection.
The subscriber uses the equipment under a commodatum agreement while the service is active.
The service is disconnected upon returning the device and all accessories. Missing/damaged accessories are billed accordingly.
The provider may refuse disconnection if the device is not returned or not reimbursed.
In case of lost/damaged device, compensation is 300 MDL/device (no VAT) or 850 MDL/device (no VAT).
Connection/disconnection can be done on any day of the billing period without recalculation.

what_is.title: What is Wi-Fi PLUS?
what_is.text_1: Wi-Fi PLUS is a service that gives you an additional device to extend Wi-Fi signal in weak zones of your home.
what_is.text_2: It receives signal from the main router and retransmits it for a fast and stable connection throughout the house.

why_choose.title: Why choose Wi-Fi PLUS?
why_choose.text: Connect multiple devices to the same Wi-Fi network without re-entering the password and without interruptions while moving around your home.

faq.q1: Is Wi-Fi PLUS compatible with any router?
faq.a1: Wi-Fi PLUS is designed to be compatible with most modern routers. For specific compatibility details, refer to the device documentation or contact Customer Support.
faq.a2: Yes, you can disconnect the Wi-Fi PLUS service at any time without penalties. Return the device at any Moldtelecom store.
faq.a3: Billing starts from the service activation moment and is included in your monthly Internet bill until it’s disconnected.

If prices or other product details are displayed incorrectly, including due to database entry errors, www.moldtelecom.md S.A.
